subject: Drivers Licenses
Drunken and Reckless Driving
Football
lead_paragraph: An Indiana court has suspended the Indianapolis Colts owner Jim Irsay’s driver’s license for one year after his arrest on charges of driving while intoxicated.
snippet: An Indiana court has suspended the Indianapolis Colts owner Jim Irsay’s driver’s license for one year after his arrest on charges of driving while intoxicated.
